chapter.p: Converters of types to text representation.
Converters of non-character C++ fundamental types to some text representation. Second parameter str is an output parameter, result is appended to it.
chapter.note: signed char and unsigned char types are treated as integers not characters!

synopsis.prototype: void to_text_append(unsigned long long n, std::string &str)
